nodes.text: Half-Axe Pass was an area of New Plympto located close to Cadgel Meadows.
In 19 BBY, it was the site of the Battle of Half-Axe Pass, where an army of Nosaurian Separatists were slaughtered, one month after the official end of the Clone Wars.
Half-Axe Pass was ruined when a Yuuzhan Vong bioweapon destroyed New Plympto in 27 ABY.
